data.name: 0000 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Come on! Let's get enthusiastic and search!

data.name: 0001 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi rushed to the library with the arrogance of a triumphant general.

data.name: 0003 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Eeek… Having to search for scary stories…

data.name: 0004 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was staggering on her feet—probably due to worry.

data.name: 0005 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't worry, Asahina.

data.name: 0006 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I gently supported Asahina, who still seemed like she might fall over. It's a perk of the job.

data.name: 0007 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Owh… I'm sorry, Kyon.

data.name: 0008 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's absolutely fine, Asahina. You can use me as your walking stick whenever you please.

data.name: 0009 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, get a move on, you two. We don't have much time, you know?

data.name: 0010 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's no point in doing this if we can't investigate before the piano starts playing.

data.name: 0011 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The truth is, Haruhi was told it'd happen about an hour earlier.

data.name: 0012 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that in mind, there's certainly not much time left…

data.name: 0013 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Okay… Eek…

data.name: 0014 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No mercy for Asahina, huh—She's been this scared since before we left for the library.

data.name: 0015 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you want, Haruhi and I can go to the library alone, Asahina?

data.name: 0016 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I feel bad that my group assignments have caused Asahina to worry so much.

data.name: 0017 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: No, it's fine. Let's head to the library.

data.name: 0018 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: This whole school is a risk right now, right? It's more scary to be alone.

data.name: 0019 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As she looks up at me with those watery eyes, I feel like she's depending on me.

data.name: 0020 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right. I'd be worried if I had to leave you alone as well.

data.name: 0021 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank you, Kyon.

data.name: 0022 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It probably would be better for me and Haruhi to go as just the two of us…

data.name: 0023 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though I was afraid to say so.

data.name: 0024 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not like it's just because I want to be together with Asahina.

data.name: 0025 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unlike Nagato or Koizumi, I don't want to leave this normal-ish girl alone for even a moment.

data.name: 0026 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But I feel like I get guys who want to go to a haunted house with her.

data.name: 0027 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Every guy instinctively wants a terrified girl clinging to him that he can support.

data.name: 0028 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina has a has a high value due to the rarity of such genuinely scared girls.

data.name: 0029 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It can even make you more likeable as a reliable and trustworthy guy…

data.name: 0030 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon? Why are you just standing there? Shouldn't we go?

data.name: 0031 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Suzumiya will be mad at us.

data.name: 0032 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah… That's right.

data.name: 0033 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Stop ogling Asahina and get over here, Kyon!

data.name: 0034 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: M-me?

data.name: 0035 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I'm sorry—I ended up holding you up…

data.name: 0036 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're fine, Mikuru. You're still doing your best even though you're bad with scary stuff.

data.name: 0037 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Stop holding Mikuru up, Kyon.

data.name: 0038 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A duck faced Haruhi ended up complaining about me.

data.name: 0041 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We took so many books from the library that I don't even want to think about returning them.

data.name: 0042 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What sort of things can we use as a reference?

data.name: 0043 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th… things like horror novels?

data.name: 0044 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina said so as if digging her own grave.

data.name: 0045 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's not right, Mikuru.

data.name: 0046 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi said so, tutting and waving her finger.

data.name: 0047 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're not looking for fiction, we're looking for things that really happened.

data.name: 0048 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You're the one that got an idea after looking at a novel Asahina found…

data.name: 0049 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The school paper, maybe? Any collection of school history will do.

data.name: 0050 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Though they wouldn't write any bad stuff, right?

data.name: 0051 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: History always get rewritten for conveneince, after all.

data.name: 0052 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She crossed her arms and nodded to the sound of her own voice.

data.name: 0053 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huhh? I-is that true?

data.name: 0054 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah? As long as you're the victor, you can write history or truth as you please.

data.name: 0055 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-you're very knowledgeable…

data.name: 0056 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't think the the school's seven wonders have anything to do with history or truth.

data.name: 0057 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're gonna expose those hidden mysteries!

data.name: 0058 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Come on Haruhi, it's not that big of a deal.

data.name: 0059 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Like if you bully someone to committing suicide by jumping, but pass it off as an accident?

data.name: 0060 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly. Systematic deception.

data.name: 0061 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That kind of thing is so awful…

data.name: 0062 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I've never heard about anything like that at North High…

data.name: 0063 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I see, so we have to read between the lines, right?

data.name: 0064 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's exactly it, Mikuru!

data.name: 0065 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll get you to look for school history, Mikuru. You can clearly read between the lines well.

data.name: 0066 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0067 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm gonna look for school papers. That's the best way to find rumors.

data.name: 0068 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that I want to hear about strange rumors.

data.name: 0069 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, you look for materials related to music! Contest participation records and such!

data.name: 0070 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, got it.

data.name: 0071 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm gonna find evidence that Haruhi's made up ghost story is impossible.

data.name: 0072 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, where would I find school history?

data.name: 0073 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wouldn't it be in this pile of school related stuff we collected?

data.name: 0074 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The stuff I'm looking for should be in here too, so let's look together.

data.name: 0077 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I dragged Asahina behind the mountain of books.

data.name: 0078 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Umm, Asahina.

data.name: 0079 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06Yes? What is it, Kyon?

data.name: 0080 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Do you understand what we should do?

data.name: 0081 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06Huh? Searching for secrets in the school's history?

data.name: 0082 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06We're looking for stuff to make Haruhi give up on her seven wonder search.

data.name: 0083 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06Oh! Right! That's what we were doing!

data.name: 0084 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …So she did forget, huh…

data.name: 0085 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06I'm really sorry, I forgot. We need to stop Haruhi before this gets serious.

data.name: 0086 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Exactly.

data.name: 0087 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06If ghosts and yokai really start showing up, this school will become an occult mecca…

data.name: 0088 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0#P06Eeek… Ghosts… I don't really want to see ghosts…

data.name: 0089 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems Asahina not only remembered the situation, but her own fear.

data.name: 0090 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe Haruhi was saying all that stuff earlier so she could get away from her fear?

data.name: 0091 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I feel sorry for her, but I need Asahina's help.

data.name: 0092 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems she'd forgotten our primary objective.

data.name: 0093 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon?

data.name: 0094 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Because of that, it seems like she forgot about her fear if even for just a moment.

data.name: 0095 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Oh, nothing. Let's look for more materials.

data.name: 0096 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, okay.

data.name: 0097 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was starting to feel like maybe that was fine.

data.name: 0098 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was only temporary, after all.

data.name: 0099 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's a shame having to remind her and waste that smile she had.

data.name: 0100 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, so there's a collection of graduation albums here.

data.name: 0101 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Graduation albums have a summary of events that happened in the year, right?

data.name: 0102 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's right.

data.name: 0103 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Staring at the spines of all these books, I pulled out a promising looking one.

data.name: 0104 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh…? I feel like I'm forgetting something…?

data.name: 0105 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina tilted her head while flicking through the pages of the album.

data.name: 0106 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ……ええと、あれ、待って？

data.name: 0107 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: あ、あああ～っ！

data.name: 0108 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: 違うぅ！ アルバムなんかめくって いる場合じゃないですぅ～！

data.name: 0109 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 朝比奈さんの現実逃避も長くは続か ないか。責任感のある人だからなあ

data.name: 0110 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: どうしたの、みくるちゃん！？

data.name: 0111 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ひゃうぅっ、な、なんでもないです 大声だしてごめんなさい～

data.name: 0112 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ならいいけど

data.name: 0113 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06ううう……あたしったら、あたしっ たら何て忘れっぽい……

data.name: 0114 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06この学校が大変なことになってるの に～、情けないですぅ

data.name: 0115 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06気にすることないですよ。怖いこと から目をそらしたい深層心理ですよ

data.name: 0116 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06こんなにすぐ思い出したんだし

data.name: 0117 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06慰めてくれるんですね、キョンくん でもあたし、自分が情けないです～

data.name: 0118 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 凹む朝比奈さんも愛らしく、俺は 言い出さなくて良かったと思った

data.name: 0121 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 抜き出した本を、目の前に 積み重ねてみる

data.name: 0122 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: どう？ 何かこれって感じのものは 見つけられた？

data.name: 0123 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ないな。第一そんな物どうやって 見つけるんだよ

data.name: 0124 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺だって見つけられるものなら、ハ ルヒの妄想の否定材料を見つけたい

data.name: 0125 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 気合いで見つけなさいよ、キョン

data.name: 0126 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 本だって見つけられたがって 呼びかけてるの

data.name: 0127 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: その信号をキャッチするのよ

data.name: 0128 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 聞いた俺がバカだった

data.name: 0129 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いいか、俺には超能力なんてない

data.name: 0130 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 人間の脳は３０％しか使われてない の

data.name: 0131 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: キョンだって、何かの能力ぐらい あるはずよ

data.name: 0132 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: そんなもんはいらん

data.name: 0133 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: まったく、面倒くさがりなんだから

data.name: 0134 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ハルヒはぶつくさ言いながら、また 本に集中する

data.name: 0135 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: こいつの集中力は、いつもながら すごい

data.name: 0136 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: その能力を、頼むから世界平和の ために使ってくれ

data.name: 0139 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はふぅ、重いです……ねっ

data.name: 0140 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 両手に新たな資料を抱えた朝比奈さ んが戻ってくる

data.name: 0141 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 朝比奈さん、そんな一度に運ばなく ても、俺が持ちますから

data.name: 0142 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: 大丈夫です、これぐらい……あっ

data.name: 0143 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 言った側から、朝比奈さんは転んで しまった

data.name: 0145 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: いたっ！

data.name: 0146 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 飛んだ本の一冊がハルヒの頭を直撃 する。……天の裁きか？

data.name: 0147 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: くっ……

data.name: 0148 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ここで吹きだしたら、ハルヒの激怒 は必至なので我慢する

data.name: 0149 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: なんなの、いったい？

data.name: 0150 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0ごっ、ごめんなさい～～っ！

data.name: 0151 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ケガしてませんか？ 朝比奈さん

data.name: 0152 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ……へ、平気です。お騒がせして しまって……

data.name: 0153 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 今のって……みくるちゃん？

data.name: 0154 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ハルヒ、朝比奈さんはわざとおまえ の頭にぶつけたんじゃないからな

data.name: 0155 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: え？ 涼宮さんに当たっちゃったん ですか？ すみません

data.name: 0156 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ……いいのよ。みくるちゃんが ドジっ娘なのは望むところだわ！

data.name: 0157 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ＳＯＳ団団長として許すわ

data.name: 0158 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ひゃうう、ごめんなさ～いっ

data.name: 0159 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 大丈夫かハルヒ。直撃だったろ

data.name: 0160 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 笑いを堪えて、聞いてみる

data.name: 0161 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ……大したことないわよ

data.name: 0162 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: キョトンとした顔でハルヒは自分の 頭を撫でているが無事そうだ

data.name: 0163 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 頭を打ったショックで、ハルヒの力 が少しでも減らないもんかね？

data.name: 0164 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はわわ、あたしのせいで、涼宮さん に本がぶつかっちゃったんですね

data.name: 0165 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ごっ、ごめんなさい～っ

data.name: 0166 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: いいのよ、みくるちゃん あたしは平気だから

data.name: 0167 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: それよりみくるちゃんは大丈夫？ ケガとかしてない？

data.name: 0168 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: あ、あたしも大丈夫です

data.name: 0169 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ハルヒは弱者や女性には けっこう優しい

data.name: 0170 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: こんな時も責めたりしないしな

data.name: 0171 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: なによ、キョン？ その顔

data.name: 0172 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いや、ちょっと見直してた とこだ

data.name: 0173 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 見直すって何よ。あたしはいつ だって最高でスペシャルなのよ！

data.name: 0174 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: はいはい、わかったよ

data.name: 0175 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: お騒がせしてすみませんでした～

data.name: 0176 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 散らばった本を拾い集めながら 律儀に謝る朝比奈さんだが……

data.name: 0178 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0ひゃあ～

data.name: 0179 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ちょっと、なにやってるのよ みくるちゃん

data.name: 0180 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0す、すみません～、ううう

data.name: 0181 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 謝るのと本を集めるのは同時にしな い方がいいと思います

data.name: 0182 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: みくるちゃん、とにかく座って 落ち着きなさい

data.name: 0183 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はい……ぐすっ

data.name: 0184 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 朝比奈さん、ハルヒなんかに 怒られて、なんとお労しい……

data.name: 0185 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ねえ、キョン

data.name: 0186 (401.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: あ？ なんだ？

data.name: 0187 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ちょっと面白い記事を見つけたのよ 音楽室とは関係ないんだけど

data.name: 0188 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 学校新聞に夏の怪談特集があってね

data.name: 0189 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0えええっ

data.name: 0190 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ほらここよ、読んでみて

data.name: 0191 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0う……うう、な、泣く銅像？

data.name: 0192 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: これは定番よね。近いものに血の涙 を流す肖像画とかがあるわ

data.name: 0193 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0うぅ……っ、や、やめてください～ 聞きたくない～っ

data.name: 0194 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 朝比奈さんが耳をふさごうとした 手が本の山にぶつかり崩れ落ちる

data.name: 0195 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: あーあ

data.name: 0196 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0はうぅっ、すぐ、拾います

data.name: 0197 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: いくらなんでも取り乱しすぎよ

data.name: 0198 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0ごめんなさい、ごめんなさい

data.name: 0199 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: みくるちゃん、じっとしてなさい 拾うのはキョンに任せればいいから

data.name: 0200 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: で、でも……

data.name: 0201 (401.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 怖い話ももうしないわ。団長命令よ 何もせずにじっとしてること

data.name: 0202 (401.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はうぅ、は、はい～、そうします

data.name: 0203 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 涙目になった朝比奈さんは、席に 座って身を小さくしている

data.name: 0204 (401.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 静けさが戻った部室で、俺は 散らばった本を集めるのだった

data.name: 0205 (401.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: みくるに提案

data.name: 0206 (401.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 黙っている

data.name: 0207 (401.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 現実を指摘する

data.name: 0208 (401.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 現実を指摘しない

data.name: 0209 (401.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: みくるを庇う

data.name: 0210 (401.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: ハルヒを労る
